import './ProductScreen.css'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { getProductDetails } from '../redux/actions/productActions'; import { addToCart } from '../redux/actions/cartActions' const ProductScreen = ({ match, history }) => { const [qty, setQty] = useState(1); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const productDetails = useSelector((state) => state.getProductDetails); const { loading, error, product } = productDetails useEffect(() => { if (product && match.params.id !== product._id) { dispatch(getProductDetails(match.params.id)) } }, [dispatch, product, match]); return (
